description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Band with a group of friends to defeat the evil sorcerer who has converted you into small insects.  Face spiderwolves, mothamancers, and giant snails in your conquest to regain your human selves.
description.short: Band with a group of friends to defeat the evil sorcerer who has converted you into small insects.  Face spiderwolves, mothamancers, and giant snails in your conquest to regain your human selves.
